headline: Jim Cramer Calls United Parcel Service “The Wrong Horse”
summary: A caller asked if they should buy more, hold, or sell United Parcel Service Inc. (NYSE:UPS) stock. In response, Cramer said: “I think that FedEx is going to clean their clock, frankly. I think that Raj Subramaniam’s a better operator, and you’re on the wrong horse. I’m sorry. I thank you for the kind words, […]
